content: For us, we care more about whether you've built a comfortable house to live in... Oh, I'm terribly sorry.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: And now, I must ask you to continue surveying ecological vitality and collecting ecological samples with Mors.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: Now, once you and everyone else help finish collecting the building materials, we'll build the <color=#8AAB4B>Omni-Gallery</color>.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: Hoho~ With you and Mors, I have no worries. Now, the Astralink's ecological vitality survey facility — the Omni-Gallery — is complete.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: If you can successfully invite <color=#8AAB4B>1</color> more <color=#8AAB4B>new neighbor</color> to the Astralink, we'll be able to get Loomi Co. to help build the Astralink Station.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: First time stranger, second time friend, and third time... Hohoho~! Perhaps as you keep talking, you can even invite them to our Astralink.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: Ah! my apologies. The new neighbor you invited before is very excited to come live with us. They're waiting for the news.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: I asked you to help look after Frostia before and delayed your own construction. I hope you'll get your new home soon.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: Ah! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, you've been busy with Frostia's new home for quite a while. That must've been a lot of work. I really appreciate it!
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: Don't worry! We Astralink coordinators have designated "residences," so we don't need your help in building a house hohoho~
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: When traveling to other Bubble Worlds, if you encounter neighbors that you like, you can try chatting them up.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: For us, we're more delighted to learn that both you and Frostia have completed your houses and reached an important milestone in the Astralink Guidebook!
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: About the two other sections of the Astralink Guidebook...
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: Hoho, Frostia loves the new home you helped build. She praises it wherever she goes and everyone's getting a little envious...
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线

content: After the new neighbor accepts your invitation, you can tell them to contact me. I'll prepare the relocation services for them.
info: 幻雪梦想家一级房屋建成-莫白_安居线
